channel.title: CVE Feed for Themeum -- Tutor LMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themeum -- Tutor LMS

item.title: CVE-2023-25800|2024-08-02T11:32:12.655Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.2.0.
